search_term: Find the official pricing page URL for awork (awork.com). Only provide the exact URL to the pricing page, not a summary of pricing information.
response_text: The official pricing page for awork can be found at this URL: [https://www.awork.com/en/pricing](https://www.awork.com/en/pricing)【3:0†source】.

![Image 7](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6418f5bfe5bc0a3438109c1d/679130355326be1b2145effc_Frame%2010123251.png)

GDPR-compliant made in EU

[![Image 8](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6418f5bfe5bc0a3438109c1d/674d79818cc17c98c38d7490_arrow-new.svg) Learn more](https://www.awork.com/enterprise)

[![Image 9](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6418f5bfe5bc0a3438109c1d/67c5ae7fe7ba332d2d0b1560_EN_Projekt-Timeline_Upmarket.webp)](https://www.awork.com/pricing#)

**We’re happy to** **help**
---------------------------

We support projects that we are convinced of with cheaper or free awork licences. So that we can tell you what is suitable for your projects, we of course need some information

We'll answer all of

your questions

Try all features with your team.

**Frequently asked**

![Image 10](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6418f5bfe5bc0a3438109c1d/6756f1eb97ea37b39dda40bb_%3F.png)

questions

&

![Image 11](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6418f5bfe5bc0a3438109c1d/6756f1eaede203fe2fab70fa_tick.png)

answers

Where is our data hosted?

awork is GDPR-compliant and is hosted on state of the art, ISO 27001 certified Microsoft servers in Germany. Besides you and, if necessary, our support technicians, no one has access to your data. This is made possible, amongst other technologies, through the encryption of all our databases. Please refer to our [privacy policy](https://www.awork.com/legal-and-privacy) for more details.

‍

How secure is awork?

We place the utmost importance on data security, and our engineers keep awork up-to-date. Our databases store all client data in encrypted form and awork is only accessible via encrypted connections. We publish fixes and security updates at least daily and regularly update our server infrastructure. Additionally, we conduct external penetration tests to verify the security of our platform.

Can we cancel any time?

Yes. If you cancel your account, you'll be responsible for charges incurred for that billing period, but you won't be charged again.

‍

Do we have to commit to a long-term contract?

Nope, you do not have to do that. You can choose to be billed monthly, annually, or bi-annually and cancel at any time. If you pick monthly billing and then cancel, you'll only be charged for the current billing period. However, if you pay for 12 or 24 months in advance, you can save some money.

‍

Can we add or remove single users?

Yes, you can add or remove users at any time. If you cancel individual users, you'll be responsible for charges incurred for that billing period, but you won't be charged again for those users.

Can we upgrade or downgrade my subscription plan?

You can change plans whenever you want. If you switch to a lower-tier plan, you will be responsible for any charges incurred for the current billing period, but you won't be billed again for that plan. However, you will loose access to the higher-tier features at the end of your current billing period.

Are there discounts for non-profit organizations?

Yes! We offer discounted or free licenses for non-profit and social projects. Please fill out 👉 [our application form](https://www.awork.com/pricing#), and we'll let you know if your project is eligible.

Do we need to install anything to use awork?

No, you just need a modern browser to access awork on any device. We do also have a desktop app that you can install for even better performance and integration into your daily working environment. You can find all downloads here.

Can we migrate data from other tools?

Absolutely! You can easily migrate data from your existing tools. Use our data importer, API, or contact us for more complex migrations, and we'll be happy to assist you.

‍

Are there any liabilities connected to signing up for the free trial?

No, you can try awork without any payment information. There are no liabilities associated with the free trial and it does not automatically renew.

Which payment methods are accepted?

We accept all major credit cards and direct debit transfers. In the Enterprise and Enterprise+ plans, you have the additional option to pay via invoice.

What kind of customer support is available?

We offer support via email and live chat with quick responses within minutes. The Professional and above plans include additional phone support. With our Enterprise and Enterprise+ plans, you'll receive premium support with priority response and specialised assistance.

Does awork offer any training or onboarding resources for new users?

Yes! We actually offer something even more powerful: our [team on board guarantee](https://www.awork.com/sales/onboarding-packages) - if you follow our established onboarding process (incl. personal training sessions), we guarantee that your team will use awork actively.

Additionally, we offer custom onboarding and implementation packages with our consulting teams for our Enterprise customers. Please [contact us](https://www.awork.com/cdn-cgi/l/email-protection#483b29242d3b08293f273a23662b2725) to talk about the specifics (technical requirements, team-size, timeline, etc.).

Do you offer staggered prices?

Yes, starting from 50 users already, we offer quantity discounts. Please feel free to schedule a call with us about it [here.](https://meetings-eu1.hubspot.com/awork/awork-advice-questions?uuid=9dfdd38f-96bb-49cd-904a-1469b3b7424a)

Do you offer a “30 day money-back guarantee”?

We’re confident you’ll love awork. But if your team feels otherwise, you can get a full refund within the first 30 days of a Basic, Standard or Professional subscription - no questions asked.

Try awork for free for 14 day. After that you can choose the pricing plan that fits your team's needs best - starting from 8€ per user per month.

pricing_data.pricing_notes: Pricing varies based on billing frequency (monthly, annually, bi-annually) and includes discounts for longer commitments.

pricing_tiers.tier_description: For small teams with basic needs.
For professional teams with extensive needs.
For large organizations with specific requirements.
Custom solutions for very large organizations.

additional_fees.fee_description: Includes personal customer success manager, admin and config guide, user training guide, dashboard to measure team activity, 2h consulting, and a full money-back guarantee.
Includes personal customer success manager, admin and config guide, user training guide, dashboard to measure team activity, 4h consulting, and a full money-back guarantee.

Not Found
===============
      

![Image 1: logo](blob:http://localhost/bc1b392682be82dfe681121904c44809)

[](https://www.cookiebot.com/en/what-is-behind-powered-by-cookiebot/)

*   [Consent](https://www.awork.com/en/pricing#)
*   [Details](https://www.awork.com/en/pricing#)
*   [\[#IABV2SETTINGS#\]](https://www.awork.com/en/pricing#)
*   [About](https://www.awork.com/en/pricing#)

🍪 We use cookies

We use cookies to personalise content and ads, to provide social media features and to analyse our traffic. We also share information about your use of our site with our social media, advertising and analytics partners who may combine it with other information that you’ve provided to them or that they’ve collected from your use of their services. 

Consent Selection

**Necessary**

**Preferences**

**Statistics**

**Marketing**

[Show details](https://www.awork.com/en/pricing#)

Details

*   Necessary 27
    
    Necessary cookies help make a website usable by enabling basic functions like page navigation and access to secure areas of the website. The website cannot function properly without these cookies.
    
    *   [Cookiebot 2](https://www.awork.com/en/pricing#)[Learn more about this provider![Image 2](blob:http://localhost/7c37f61654102a88a9be209f9569ef78)](https://www.cookiebot.com/goto/privacy-policy/ "Cookiebot's privacy policy")
        
        **CookieConsent \[x2\]**Stores the user's cookie consent state for the current domain
        
        **Maximum Storage Duration**: 1 year**Type**: HTTP Cookie
        
    *   [Google 1](https://www.awork.com/en/pricing#)[Learn more about this provider![Image 3](blob:http://localhost/7c37f61654102a88a9be209f9569ef78)](https://business.safety.google/privacy/ "Google's privacy policy")
        
        Some of the data collected by this provider is for the purposes of personalization and measuring advertising effectiveness.
        
        **test\_cookie**Pending
        
        **Maximum Storage Duration**: 1 day**Type**: HTTP Cookie
        
    *   [LinkedIn 2](https://www.awork.com/en/pricing#)[Learn more about this provider![Image 4](blob:http://localhost/7c37f61654102a88a9be209f9569ef78)](https://www.linkedin.com/legal/privacy-policy "LinkedIn's privacy policy")
        
        **bcookie**Used in order to detect spam and improve the website's security.
        
        **Maximum Storage Duration**: 1 year**Type**: HTTP Cookie
        
        **li\_gc**Stores the user's cookie consent state for the current domain
        
        **Maximum Storage Duration**: 180 days**Type**: HTTP Cookie
        
    *   [RudderStack 5](https://www.awork.com/en/pricing#)[Learn more about this provider![Image 5](blob:http://localhost/7c37f61654102a88a9be209f9569ef78)](https://www.rudderstack.com/cookie-policy/ "RudderStack's privacy policy")
        
        **#.#-#-#-#-#.ack**Used to contain user’s survey and quiz answers in Local Storage.
        
        **Maximum Storage Duration**: Persistent**Type**: HTML Local Storage
        
        **#.#-#-#-#-#.inProgress**Used to contain user’s survey and quiz answers in Local Storage.
        
        **Maximum Storage Duration**: Persistent**Type**: HTML Local Storage
        
        **#.#-#-#-#-#.queue**Used to contain user’s survey and quiz answers in Local Storage.
        
        **Maximum Storage Duration**: Persistent**Type**: HTML Local Storage
        
        **#.#-#-#-#-#.reclaimEnd**Used to contain user’s survey and quiz answers in Local Storage.
        
        **Maximum Storage Duration**: Persistent**Type**: HTML Local Storage
        
        **#.#-#-#-#-#.reclaimStart**Used to contain user’s survey and quiz answers in Local Storage.
        
        **Maximum Storage Duration**: Persistent**Type**: HTML Local Storage
        
    *   [Typeform 2](https://www.awork.com/en/pricing#)[Learn more about this provider![Image 6](blob:http://localhost/7c37f61654102a88a9be209f9569ef78)](https://admin.typeform.com/to/dwk6gt/ "Typeform's privacy policy")
        
        **AWSALBTG**Registers which server-cluster is serving the visitor. This is used in context with load balancing, in order to optimize user experience.
        
        **Maximum Storage Duration**: 7 days**Type**: HTTP Cookie
        
        **AWSALBTGCORS**Registers which server-cluster is serving the visitor. This is used in context with load balancing, in order to optimize user experience.
        
        **Maximum Storage Duration**: 7 days**Type**: HTTP Cookie
        
    *   [calendly.com hs-analytics.net hs-banner.com hubspot-logos.com t.co 11](https://www.awork.com/en/pricing#)
        
        **\_\_cf\_bm \[x11\]**This cookie is used to distinguish between humans and bots. This is beneficial for the website, in order to make valid reports on the use of their website.
        
        **Maximum Storage Duration**: 1 day**Type**: HTTP Cookie
        
    *   [calendly.com hsforms.com 3](https://www.awork.com/en/pricing#)
        
        **\_cfuvid \[x3\]**This cookie is a part of the services provided by Cloudflare - Including load-balancing, deliverance of website content and serving DNS connection for website operators.
        
        **Maximum Storage Duration**: Session**Type**: HTTP Cookie
        
    *   [www.awork.com 1](https://www.awork.com/en/pricing#)
        
        **wf\_auth\_page**This cookie is necessary for the login function on the website.
        
        **Maximum Storage Duration**: Session**Type**: HTTP Cookie
        
    
*   Preferences 8
    
    Preference cookies enable a website to remember information that changes the way the website behaves or looks, like your preferred language or the region that you are in.
    
    *   [Intercom 3](https://www.awork.com/en/pricing#)[Learn more about this provider![Image 7](blob:http://localhost/7c37f61654102a88a9be209f9569ef78)](https://www.intercom.com/terms-and-policies#privacy "Intercom's privacy policy")
        
        **intercom-device-id-#**Sets a specific ID for the user which ensures the integrity of the website’s chat function.
        
        **Maximum Storage Duration**: 271 days**Type**: HTTP Cookie
        
        **intercom-id-#**Allows the website to recoqnise the visitor, in order to optimize the chat-box functionality.
        
        **Maximum Storage Duration**: 271 days**Type**: HTTP Cookie
        
        **intercom-session-#**Sets a specific ID for the user which ensures the integrity of the website’s chat function.
        
        **Maximum Storage Duration**: 7 days**Type**: HTTP Cookie
        
    *   [LinkedIn 1](https://www.awork.com/en/pricing#)[Learn more about this provider![Image 8](blob:http://localhost/7c37f61654102a88a9be209f9569ef78)](https://www.linkedin.com/legal/privacy-policy "LinkedIn's privacy policy")
        
        **lidc**Registers which server-cluster is serving the visitor. This is used in context with load balancing, in order to optimize user experience.
        
        **Maximum Storage Duration**: 1 day**Type**: HTTP Cookie
        
    *   [Typeform 2](https://www.awork.com/en/pricing#)[Learn more about this provider![Image 9](blob:http://localhost/7c37f61654102a88a9be209f9569ef78)](https://admin.typeform.com/to/dwk6gt/ "Typeform's privacy policy")
        
        **tf\_random\_id**Used to implement forms on the website.
        
        **Maximum Storage Duration**: Persistent**Type**: HTML Local Storage
        
        **tf\_respondent\_cc**Used to implement forms on the website.
        
        **Maximum Storage Duration**: 6 months**Type**: HTTP Cookie
        
    *   [js.intercomcdn.com www.awork.com 2](https://www.awork.com/en/pricing#)
        
        **intercom.intercom-state-# \[x2\]**Remembers whether the user has minimized or closed chat-box or pop-up messages on the website.
        
        **Maximum Storage Duration**: Persistent**Type**: HTML Local Storage
        
    
*   Statistics 14
    
    Statistic cookies help website owners to understand how visitors interact with websites by collecting and reporting information anonymously.
    
    *   [Adobe Inc. 1](https://www.awork.com/en/pricing#)[Learn more about this provider![Image 10](blob:http://localhost/7c37f61654102a88a9be209f9569ef78)](https://www.adobe.com/privacy.html "Adobe Inc.'s privacy policy")
        
        **p.gif**Keeps track of special fonts used on the website for internal analysis. The cookie does not register any visitor data.
        
        **Maximum Storage Duration**: Session**Type**: Pixel Tracker
        
    *   [Outbrain 1](https://www.awork.com/en/pricing#)[Learn more about this provider![Image 11](blob:http://localhost/7c37f61654102a88a9be209f9569ef78)](https://www.outbrain.com/legal/privacy#privacy-policy "Outbrain's privacy policy")
        
        **dicbo\_id**Collects statistics concerning the visitors' use of the website and its general functionality. This is used to optimize and compile reports on the website for comparison through a third party analysis service.
        
        **Maximum Storage Duration**: 1 day**Type**: HTTP Cookie
        
    *   [RudderStack 5](https://www.awork.com/en/pricing#)[Learn more about this provider![Image 12](blob:http://localhost/7c37f61654102a88a9be209f9569ef78)](https://www.rudderstack.com/cookie-policy/ "RudderStack's privacy policy")
        
        **rl\_anonymous\_id**Registers statistical data on users' behaviour on the website. Used for internal analytics by the website operator.
        
        **Maximum Storage Duration**: Persistent**Type**: HTML Local Storage
        
        **rl\_group\_id**Registers statistical data on users' behaviour on the website. Used for internal analytics by the website operator.
        
        **Maximum Storage Duration**: Persistent**Type**: HTML Local Storage
        
        **rl\_group\_trait**Registers statistical data on users' behaviour on the website. Used for internal analytics by the website operator.
        
        **Maximum Storage Duration**: Persistent**Type**: HTML Local Storage
        
        **rl\_trait**Registers statistical data on users' behaviour on the website. Used for internal analytics by the website operator.
        
        **Maximum Storage Duration**: Persistent**Type**: HTML Local Storage
        
        **rl\_user\_id**Registers statistical data on users' behaviour on the website. Used for internal analytics by the website operator.
        
        **Maximum Storage Duration**: Persistent**Type**: HTML Local Storage
        
    *   [Segment 2](https://www.awork.com/en/pricing#)[Learn more about this provider![Image 13](blob:http://localhost/7c37f61654102a88a9be209f9569ef78)](https://segment.com/docs/legal/privacy/ "Segment's privacy policy")
        
        **ajs\_anonymous\_id**This cookie is used to identify a specific visitor - this information is used to identify the number of specific visitors on a website.
        
        **Maximum Storage Duration**: 1 year**Type**: HTTP Cookie
        
        **ajs\_anonymous\_id**This cookie is used to count how many times a website has been visited by different visitors - this is done by assigning the visitor an ID, so the visitor does not get registered twice.
        
        **Maximum Storage Duration**: Persistent**Type**: HTML Local Storage
        
    *   [TikTok 1](https://www.awork.com/en/pricing#)[Learn more about this provider![Image 14](blob:http://localhost/7c37f61654102a88a9be209f9569ef78)](https://www.tiktok.com/legal/privacy-policy?lang=en "TikTok's privacy policy")
        
        **\_tt\_enable\_cookie**Used by the social networking service, TikTok, for tracking the use of embedded services.
        
        **Maximum Storage Duration**: 1 year**Type**: HTTP Cookie
        
    *   [Twitter Inc. 1](https://www.awork.com/en/pricing#)[Learn more about this provider![Image 15](blob:http://localhost/7c37f61654102a88a9be209f9569ef78)](https://twitter.com/en/privacy "Twitter Inc.'s privacy policy")
        
        **personalization\_id**This cookie is set by Twitter - The cookie allows the visitor to share content from the website onto their Twitter profile.
        
        **Maximum Storage Duration**: 400 days**Type**: HTTP Cookie
        
    *   [Typeform 2](https://www.awork.com/en/pricing#)[Learn more about this provider![Image 16](blob:http://localhost/7c37f61654102a88a9be209f9569ef78)](https://admin.typeform.com/to/dwk6gt/ "Typeform's privacy policy")
        
        **dd\_cookie\_test\_#**Registers data on visitors' website-behaviour. This is used for internal analysis and website optimization.
        
        **Maximum Storage Duration**: 1 day**Type**: HTTP Cookie
        
        **tracking\_session\_id**Determines when the visitor last visited the different subpages on the website, as well as sets a timestamp for when the session started.
        
        **Maximum Storage Duration**: 1 day**Type**: HTTP Cookie

About

Cookies are small text files that can be used by websites to make a user's experience more efficient.  
  
The law states that we can store cookies on your device if they are strictly necessary for the operation of this site. For all other types of cookies we need your permission.  
  
This site uses different types of cookies. Some cookies are placed by third party services that appear on our pages.  
  
You can at any time change or withdraw your consent from the Cookie Declaration on our website.  
  
Learn more about who we are, how you can contact us and how we process personal data in our Privacy Policy.  
  
Please state your consent ID and date when you contact us regarding your consent.
